alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ASCENSION, SOUTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON, EAST CENTRAL IBERVILLE AND SOUTH CENTRAL EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 402 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prairieville, or 7 miles northwest of Gonzales, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Gonzales, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Sorrento, French Settlement, Old Jefferson, Geismar, Prairieville, Village St. George, Shenandoah, Inniswold, and Gardere. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 163 and 184. Interstate 12 between mile markers 7 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension
